00096 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccDictEntry
00097 {
00098 public: //member functions
00099   CIccDictEntry();
00100   CIccDictEntry(const CIccDictEntry& IDE);
00101   CIccDictEntry &operator=(const CIccDictEntry &IDE);
00102   virtual ~CIccDictEntry();
00103 
00104   void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00105 
00106   icUInt32Number PosRecSize();
00107 
00108   //Data
00109   std::wstring m_sName;
00110 
00111   std::wstring::const_iterator ValueBegin() {return m_sValue.begin();}
00112   std::wstring::const_iterator ValueEnd() {return m_sValue.end();}
00113 
00114   std::wstring GetValue() { return m_sValue; }
00115   bool IsValueSet() { return m_bValueSet; }
00116 
00117   //GetNameLocalized and GetValueLocalized both give direct access to objects owned by the CIccDirEntry object
00118   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode* GetNameLocalized() { return m_pNameLocalized; }
00119   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode* GetValueLocalized() { return m_pValueLocalized; }
00120 
00121   void UnsetValue() { m_sValue.empty(); m_bValueSet = false; }
00122   bool SetValue(std::wstring sValue);
00123 
00124   //SetNameLocalized and SetValueLocalized both transfer ownership of the argument to the CIccDirEntry object
00125   //deleting access to previous object
00126   bool SetNameLocalized(CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pNameLocalized);
00127   bool SetValueLocalized(CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pValueLocalized);
00128 
00129 protected:
00130   std::wstring m_sValue; 
00131   bool m_bValueSet;
00132 
00133   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *m_pNameLocalized;
00134   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *m_pValueLocalized;
00135 };
00136 
00137 class CIccDictEntryPtr
00138 {
00139 public:
00140   CIccDictEntry *ptr;
00141 };
00142 
00150 typedef std::list<CIccDictEntryPtr> CIccNameValueDict;

00159 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTagDict : public CIccTag
00160 {
00161 public:
00162   CIccTagDict();
00163   CIccTagDict(const CIccTagDict &dict);
00164   CIccTagDict &operator=(const CIccTagDict &dict);
00165   virtual CIccTag *NewCopy() const { return new CIccTagDict(*this);}
00166   virtual ~CIccTagDict();
00167 
00168   virtual icTagTypeSignature GetType() { return icSigDictType; }
00169   virtual const icChar *GetClassName() { return "CIccTagDict"; }
00170 
00171   virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
00172 
00173   virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
00174   virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
00175 
00176   virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccProfile* pProfile=NULL) const;
00177 
00178   bool AreNamesUnique() const;
00179   bool AreNamesNonzero() const;
00180 
00181   CIccDictEntry *Get(const char *szName) const;
00182   CIccDictEntry *Get(const icUInt16Number *szName) const;
00183   CIccDictEntry *Get(std::wstring sName) const;
00184 
00185   std::wstring GetValue(const char *szName, bool *bIsSet=NULL) const;
00186   std::wstring GetValue(const icUnicodeChar *szName, bool *bIsSet=NULL) const;
00187   std::wstring GetValue(std::wstring sName, bool *bIsSet=NULL) const;
00188 
00189   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode* GetNameLocalized(std::wstring sName) const;
00190   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode* GetNameLocalized(const icUnicodeChar *szName) const;
00191   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode* GetNameLocalized(const char *szName) const;
00192 
00193   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode* GetValueLocalized(std::wstring sName) const;
00194   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode* GetValueLocalized(const icUnicodeChar *szName) const;
00195   CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode* GetValueLocalized(const char *szName) const;
00196 
00197   bool Remove(std::wstring sName);
00198   bool Remove(const icUnicodeChar *szName);
00199   bool Remove(const char *szName);
00200 
00201   bool Set(const char *szName, const char *szValue=NULL);
00202   bool Set(const icUnicodeChar *szName, const icUnicodeChar *szValue=NULL);
00203   bool Set(std::wstring sName, std::wstring sValue, bool bUnSet=false);
00204 
00205   bool SetNameLocalized(const char *szName, CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pTag);
00206   bool SetNameLocalized(const icUnicodeChar *szName, CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pTag);
00207   bool SetNameLocalized(std::wstring sName, CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pTag);
00208 
00209   bool SetValueLocalized(const char *szName, CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pTag);
00210   bool SetValueLocalized(const icUnicodeChar *szName, CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pTag);
00211   bool SetValueLocalized(std::wstring sName, CIccTagMultiLocalizedUnicode *pTag);
00212 
00213   CIccNameValueDict *m_Dict;
00214 
00215 protected:
00216   bool m_bBadAlignment;
00217   void Cleanup();
00218   icUInt32Number MaxPosRecSize();
00219 
00220   icUInt32Number m_tagSize;
00221   icUInt32Number m_tagStart;
00222 };
